scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run image-service"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:backend" "npm run image-service"
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
